definition: lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
to sculpt/to carve/musical instrument (old)
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
to ask
(equivalent to 的 as possessive particle)
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: Maintain an inquisitive mind and do not accept the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 保持一颗追根问底地心，不接受”现状“。

sentences.english: Efforts to limit scrutiny of embarrassing events isn't unusual in China.
sentences.chinese: 限制对敏感事件追根问底的举措在中国并不罕见。

sentences.english: We decided to start from scratch and question everything.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定从头开始并对不了解的一切问题追根问底。

sentences.english: Children always love to dive to the bottom of a subject.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们总是喜欢追根问底。

definition: to get to the heart of the matter
to dig up roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
to go to the bottom of things (idiom)
pinyin: da3 po4 sha1 guo1 wen4 dao4 di3

definition: lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
see 追根究底[zhui1 gen1 jiu1 di3]
to trace sth back to its source/to get to the bottom of sth
to track sth to its roots
lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
to perform an in-depth investigation
to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
lips sealed and not saying anything (idiom); fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
lit. to penetrate into a bull's horn (idiom); fig. to waste time on an insoluble or insignificant problem/to bash one's head against a brick wall/a wild goose chase/a blind alley/to split hairs
to play deaf-mute
to equivocate/to talk evasively (idiom)
to interrogate/to question closely
